biases.name: NEUTRAL
biases.headline: Felon Dusk announces new vehicle which is unlikely to explode.
biases.text: The Suokan enterpreneur and self-proclaimed angel investor unveiled a new vehicle from his Besla brand. Its batteries boast 700km of autonomy and an explosion rate of 12%.

biases.name: INNOVATIVE!
biases.headline: Felon Dusk announces groundbreaking new vehicle with a record-low chance of explosion.
biases.text: The Suokan enterpreneur and angel investor unveiled a groundbreaking new vehicle from his Besla brand. Its batteries boast 700km of autonomy and a yet unseen explosion rate of only 12%. What are you waiting for? What are any of us waiting for, really?

biases.name: TRASH
biases.headline: If you want an exploding car, Felon Dusk has you covered.
biases.text: The Suokan enterpreneur, former wealthy child and self-proclaimed angel investor unveiled a new groundbreaking vehicle from his Besla brand. Groundbreaking in the sense that at any given time it may form a crater and blast its driver into outer space.
